basic_review_structure.title: Basic Review Note Structure
sections: [FEATURE 1] - First impressive aspect + reason + example + result
[FEATURE 2] - Second impressive aspect + reason + example + result

example.main_claim: The thing that is most likely to impress you is the stunning cinematography
example.reason: This is because the director uses natural lighting throughout
example.example: For example, the sunset scenes in the desert are breathtaking
example.result: As a result, every frame looks like a work of art

example.main_claim: What sets this apart from typical romantic comedies
example.contrast: is that it deals with real relationship problems
example.example: For instance, the couple actually argues about money and career choices
example.result: This means the story feels authentic rather than formulaic

example.sentence_1: Choosing a good sushi restaurant can be a huge challenge
example.sentence_2: However, Sakura Sushi is clearly an option one should consider
example.expansion: Located in the city centre, this family-run establishment has been serving authentic Japanese cuisine for fifteen years

example.sentence_1: Known for its innovative gameplay, Portal has been a favourite amongst puzzle enthusiasts
example.sentence_2: Developed by Valve in 2007, it remains an emblematic example of creative game design
example.expansion: Regarded as one of the most original games ever made, few can rival its clever use of physics-based puzzles

pattern_question.structure: Question → answer with what you're reviewing

example.sentence_1: Have you ever wondered what makes a great café?
example.sentence_2: The Book Nook combines excellent coffee, a cosy atmosphere, and the perfect environment for studying
example.expansion: If you're looking for a place to spend hours reading or working, then this hidden gem can be an ideal choice

film_acting.main_idea: The thing that is most likely to impress you is the lead actor's performance

expansion.reason: This is because he completely transforms himself for the role
expansion.example: For instance, his subtle facial expressions convey years of unspoken pain
expansion.result: As a result, you completely forget you're watching an actor

restaurant_atmosphere.main_idea: The other feature which I found most impressive is the welcoming atmosphere

expansion.reason: This works so well because of the thoughtful interior design
expansion.example: For example, soft jazz music plays in the background, and warm lighting creates an intimate mood
expansion.result: Consequently, it feels more like dining at a friend's house than in a commercial restaurant

book_plot.main_idea: If you like to appreciate clever storytelling, by far the best feature is the non-linear narrative

expansion.reason: What makes this so effective is how each chapter reveals a new piece of the mystery
expansion.example: Take the opening chapter, which only makes sense once you've finished the entire book
expansion.result: This means you'll want to read it again immediately to spot all the clues you missed

app_design.main_idea: Anyone interested in design will be especially impressed by the intuitive interface

expansion.reason: The reason this works so well is that everything is exactly where you'd expect it to be
expansion.example: For example, you can complete most tasks with just one or two taps
expansion.result: As a result, even first-time users can navigate the app without any tutorial

concert_setlist.main_idea: By far the best feature was the carefully curated setlist

expansion.reason: This is particularly impressive because they managed to satisfy both longtime fans and newcomers
expansion.example: For instance, classic hits like 'Wonderwall' were balanced with deep cuts that true fans appreciated
expansion.result: The effect of this was that the entire crowd remained engaged from start to finish

example.sentence_1: I guarantee that The Grand Budapest Hotel will not disappoint anyone seeking visually stunning cinema
example.sentence_2: For anyone who is interested in quirky, artistic films, this is a must
example.sentence_3: It's one of the best films I've ever seen, and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it

example.sentence_1: I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone who appreciates authentic Italian cooking
example.sentence_2: Although it's not cheap, the quality more than justifies the price
example.sentence_3: If you're celebrating a special occasion, this is the perfect choice

balanced_recommendation.structure: Overall positive + acknowledge limitation + final endorsement

example.sentence_1: Overall, I'd recommend this game despite some minor technical issues
example.sentence_2: While it can be challenging at times, patient players will find it incredibly rewarding
example.sentence_3: On balance, it's well worth your time and money

film_review_plan.title: Film Review Quick Plan
film_review_plan.intro: Hook: choosing/famous → identify film + genre + director
film_review_plan.feature_1: Acting/characters → why impressive → example scene → impact
film_review_plan.feature_2: Plot/theme → what stands out → example → why it matters
film_review_plan.recommendation: Who it's for → verdict → memorable aspect

restaurant_review_plan.title: Restaurant Review Quick Plan
restaurant_review_plan.intro: Hook: choosing/location → identify restaurant + type + specialty
restaurant_review_plan.feature_1: Food quality → ingredients/preparation → example dish → taste/experience
restaurant_review_plan.feature_2: Atmosphere/service → describe → specific example → overall feeling
restaurant_review_plan.recommendation: Who suits → value for money → final verdict

book_review_plan.title: Book Review Quick Plan
book_review_plan.intro: Hook: question/famous → identify book + author + genre
book_review_plan.feature_2: Writing style/themes → what impressed → example → emotional impact

app_review_plan.title: App Review Quick Plan
app_review_plan.intro: Hook: challenge/need → identify app + function + developer
app_review_plan.feature_1: Key feature → why useful → example usage → benefit
app_review_plan.feature_2: Design/usability → what works → example → user experience
app_review_plan.recommendation: Who needs it → value → overall rating

between_features: The other feature which I found most impressive is...
Another aspect that deserves mention is...

introduction.tip: Keep it concise - you want to get to the features quickly

feature_paragraph_1.tip: This is your main selling point - develop it fully

feature_paragraph_2.tip: Can be slightly shorter than first feature

recommendation.tip: End strongly - this is what readers remember
